recordings.rmk: flying out of small marshy area disturbed by me walking by nearby trail
Moore et al. 2013: Bird Sounds of Ecuador DVD During short flight
Moore et al. 2013: Bird Sounds of Ecuador DVD

At and inland coastal plain rookery of about 20 pairs.  There is some concern that populations away from the coast are declining.  The individual was apart from  the rest of the rookery and was quickly joined by a fledgling seeking food.  There are no alterations to this file.

recordings.loc: Lake Martin, St. Martin Parish, Louisiana
recordings.rmk: Natural vocalizations from adults at nests in low shrubs (2-3m) in flooded forest. This low patch was the preferred nesting of the species, with white egrets, spoonbills, and other herons in taller trees around the Little Blues. Mostly squabbling notes as birds arrived and departed the nests, or got too close to adjacent nests. Some nests had eggs already. Dull hum from overhead electrical wires; some wind noise.

recordings.loc: Lake Martin, St. Martin Parish, Louisiana
recordings.rmk: Natural vocalizations from adults at nests in low shrubs (2-3m) in flooded forest. Mostly squabbling notes as birds arrived and departed the nests, or got too close to adjacent nests. Some nests had eggs already. Dull hum from overhead electrical wires.
